author: Simon Difford
description: To quote Victor Bergeron (Trader Vic), "You know, this rigmarole with a pinch of salt and lemon juice and tequila - in whatever order - was originally for a purpose: It's hot in Mexico. People dehydrate themselves. And they need more salt. Here, it's not so hot, and we don't need salt in the same way. So you can drink tequila straight right out of the bottle, if you want to."
name: Tequila Slammer
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: POUR tequila into glass and then carefully LAYER with champagne
The drinker should hold and cover the top of the glass with the palm of their hand so as to grip it firmly and seal the contents inside
Then they should briskly pick the glass up and slam it down (obviously not so hard as to break the glass), then gulp the drink down in one while it is still fizzing
